title: 19. Roomie Chat: How I Started My Youtube Channel, Being Firm with Clients, Rosacea, Acne + The Best Job Out of Esthetics School Is...?!
description:
Hi Roomies, this is a casual, Q+A based episode! I am covering:

- How to treat rosacea (do's and don'ts!)

- the most affordable acne treatment

- how to be FIRM with your clients

- how I started my YouTube channel + living for myself

- the best job out of esthetics school

- how to set the expectation with clients

- the misconception clients have

MY SOCIAL MEDIA:

Tess' Instagram @myestytessa

Tess' YouTube: Tess Zolly 

Tess' TikTok: @myestytessa

Sweet by LiQWYD | https://www.instagram.com/liqwyd

Music promoted by https://www.free-stock-music.com Creative Commons Attribution 3.0

Unported License https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/deed.en_US
